venue.address_2: Corner of 28 ByPass & Rattlesnake Hill R
venue.name: Massabesic - Rattlesnake Hill Road

item.description:
NOTE: This meeting falls on Mother's Day

Hiking WaterProof Shoes Recommended

I have a map of the trails in that area that I'll be glad to share. This is one of my favorites.

The picture I posted for this meeting is the map. Click on it to view it larger.

On the left of the graphic is the meeting point, look for the word Park in RED on the left of the picture.

The better known parking lot for the lake, by the baseball field, is on the right hand side of the picture, just off the rotary - the red round circle. There's about 2 miles from the rotary to the meetup spot.
item.how_to_find_us: The entrance to the trail is at the intersection of Rte 28 ByPass (Londonderry Turnpike) & Rattlesnake Hill Road in Auburn. The Puppy Mobile will be parked on one side of Rte 28 - Green Volvo Station Wagon with NH plate eprint.
item.why: This trail is one of the more deserted for Massabesic. More offleash fun, 2 remote beaches and takes about 2 hours round trip.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Soles & Paws explore Massabesic
